Feb 12, 2009

Being Cool


Few of my friends recently raised the concern that 'I am heading towards geekdom and that I am not being as cool as they are'. So one day I had to lend my unwilling ears to their 'grand lecture' on portraying oneself as 'a cool dude'. The lesson culminated into a fight over "Metal vs. Hip Hop","Gyming vs. Sports", "Long Hairs vs. Short Hairs". And the docile pupil learnt his first lesson, "You have to be different." Wow! Brilliant eh! I dedicate this post to those peers of mine.

Well, here comes links of some really cool pics.

  1. A collection of really weird and unusual bikes from around the world.

  2. As long as you don't swing around!
